message.body: Are we selling tables this year? Heard a rumor but I didn't know about it
I think the tix prices are reasonable but I thought selling tables kind of goes against our philosophy. We have so many fans who stand in line for hours to get a table
Yes just saw it! Will look today :)
Maybe we could get fancy lighters printed in tine?
Oh that's a good idea. I will see if Phinn found anything. One problem for me is I don't know how to order. I mean where to get the design and stuff
Hi guys I just brought posters to co-op and they said they just got one but I left extras because people keep taking them
So let's keep an eye out when we go there!
Thanks Emma. I just dropped one there too
Oh sweet! Now they have extras in case it gets stolen again!
